name: Splashy Ballz
description:
The goal is simple! Try to collect the same color of jelly balls to increase your energy.
Swipe your finger at any place on screen to move your ball in that direction.
Avoid the balls of different color, they will decrease your energy. Hold your eye on energy bar, don't let it drop too low.
Find your peace of mind and relaxation at this simple game.
Good Luck :) !!!
